author: smrenna
body:
#### PR description:

This satisfies a request for a particle gun that produces a flat mass spectrum.
This is achieved in two ways:   for a two particle state, the mass is chosen and the kinematics are defined in
the rest frame of the pair;   then the pair is boosted to the desired energy, eta, pT, etc.
For more complex final states, one can introduce a generic resonance in the configuration file with the desired
decay products and the machinery works as before but for a single particle.

#### PR validation:

In the test directory, I have a configuration file Py8MassGun_cfg.py that runs the gun.
I have looked at the output of event listings, and it satisfies the requirements.
